## ValidationIssueFilters class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Methods related to `ValidationIssueFilter` instances.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ValidationIssueFilters 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [byExcludedTypes(excludedTypes)](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissuefilters.byexcludedtypes.md) | <code>static</code> | **_(BETA)_** Creates a <code>ValidationIssueFilter</code> that excludes all <code>ValidationIssue</code> instances where the <code>ValidationIssue#type</code> is one of the given strings. |
|  [byIncludedSeverities(includedServerities)](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissuefilters.byincludedseverities.md) | <code>static</code> | **_(BETA)_** Creates a <code>ValidationIssueFilter</code> that includes all <code>ValidationIssue</code> instances where the <code>ValidationIssue#severity</code> is one of the given severities. |
